reviews.review:
Para su epoc los graficos eran impresionantes pero actualmente estos graficos son impresionantes. Un juego bastante divertido y adictivo. Te aseguras la diversion al 100%. Te recomiendo que lo compren en oferta con todas las expansiones y los Bioshock 1 y 2 remakes. 

Vale la pena? Seeee, valenardo la penardo!!
final explode a mente !!!! otimo jogo !

A great game. An interesting change from the first two games. 
The plot is fairly clever, though it does have a few holes in it.
If only most FPS games had this much plot, and if only other games took notes from this when it comes to escorting NPCs.

I'd give the Clash in the Clouds DLC a miss though.  That thing is just atrocious.
good
преколдес,прошел за 1 день

The core gameplay itself isn't particularly interesting. Walk to scene A. Shoot dudes. Walk to scene B. Shoot dudes + the bullet sponge enemy. Throw magic abilities out sometimes, if you feel like it. What makes the game really good is the storytelling and characters. The slow unraveling of the mysteries around the various characters and the final resolution were done fantastically. Intriguing throughout with a satisfying ending.
Jogo espetacular, um dos melhores jogos ja lançados desde quando foi inventado o Video Game, no modo geral !!! Eu amo muito este Bioshock Infinite !!
Quite possibly one of the greatest narratives in video games. My favorite game of all time. The Burial at Sea DLC is nice as well but the real star is the main game. Love this game.

Bom demais, vale cada centavo que paguei, mesmo não sendo muitos.

Игра 10/10 , чтобы понять сюжет вам нужно как минимум учиться в 11 классе (joke) сюжет очень сложный, но очень интересный и впечатления от него остаюсь только положительные, прошёл все 3 части и не пожалел игра стоит того.
The game is 10/10, in order to understand the plot you need to at least study in grade 11 (joke) the plot is very difficult, but very interesting and the impressions from it remain only positive, went through all 3 parts and did not regret the game is worth it.
good
我是正版游戏的受害者
Gun go shoot

Si te gusto el Bioshock original este te gustara también, ha envejecido mal, bastante peor que el original, pero sigue siendo un gran juego, el DLC de Burial at Sea es obligatorio de jugar para completar la narrativa que es en verdad lo mejor de este titulo. La jugabilidad redunda a veces y se pasa de simple, pero insisto que lo mejor que tiene que ofrecer esta saga es y siempre sera su historia y narrativa. Muy critica en algunos aspectos sociales y un poco floja en otros, pero over all muy buena y decente.
nice game

this game is awesome . like the fact that they tie in the other games in the end . love the fact that they ended up returning to rapture in the end . where it all began. *Bring us the girl, Wipe away the debt*

acho que nem preciso dizer muita coisa né, esse jogo é maravilhoso, todos jogos bioshock são! E esse não poderia ser diferente, joguei apenas 3 horas (ainda) mas nesse tempo você descobre o quão lindo e divertido esse jogo é, pode ter alguns bugs mas nada que interfira na gameplay. Resumindo: acho que todos tenham que ter uma oportunidade de jogar bioshock infinite ou o outros dois, encantam qualquer um! Bioshock é maravilhoso, espetacular.

Et meget godt spil med mega god gunplay og seje powers. Man kan virkeligt blive kreativ og finde de beste kombinasjoner. Historien er også nice, men noget abstrakt. Litt irriterande at man må velge mellem to våpen hele tiden og ikke får et fult repertoar, men det fører til at man må tenke mere "on the fly", så det er måske godt.

Sonu çok karışık, eğer ingilizceniz yoksa imkansız anlamak.

Listen, I know this isn't the game that we were supposed to get but it is still pretty amazing. The world is so beautiful and a real treat to explore and swing around, plus the portions where you return to Rapture. The story is just as gripping as in the previous games and is a fitting end to this trilogy, with a twist that matches the original except even more confusing. Elizabeth is probably one of the best companion AIs ever put into a videogame, she doesn't get in the way and even throws ammo or health to the player when needed. One issue that some people were upset about is that you can only hold two guns at one time whereas earlier you could hold all of them, I didn't think that this affected my experience negatively.

Eu vejo Bioshock Infinite como um jogo que ou você odeia bastante ou você acha absurdamente incrível. Para os fãs de longa data dos primeiros jogos, acredito que não vão se decepcionar com o jogo. 

Ao contrário do primeiro Bioshock, que oferece inúmeras possibilidades de exploração e variados modos de executar os objetivos. No infinite isso é mais limitado: só se pode equipar duas armas por vez, a quantidade de poderes é reduzida, os locais são mais lineares, não se pode mais upar as armas. Em resumo, o game é inferior mecanicamente. Entretanto, a narrativa do jogo é de longe a mais complexa entre os três jogos, mais intrigante e mais bem escrita. Se você, assim como eu, é do tipo que acha a história de um jogo o ponto mais importante, os defeitos de gameplay passarão despercebidos a princípio (você vai estar muito imerso no mundo magnífico do jogo pra notar). 

As mecânicas de se locomover pelos trilhos na cidade, além da possibilidade de combinar os poderes e a adição de uma companheira, extremamente carismática, que te ajuda em batalhas trazem uma ótima dinâmica pro gameplay, fazendo com que os defeitos, antes citados, não ofusquem a gameplay por completo e a torne tediosa.

Mesmo com suas limitações em relação aos jogos anteriores, Bioshock Infinite é uma jornada incrível que com certeza vale a pena ser experienciada.

Сюжет очень геморный, но он не становится из-за этого хуже. Просто по ходу прохождения, я не мог вникнуть полностью в сюжет, и понять до конца, что происходит на экране. 
Гемплей прикольный, однообразный, но неплохой и сделано качественно.
+- присутствуют рпг моменты, но можно сказать, что их тут нема(хотя опять же, я бы взял в инвентарь ту же аптечку или патроны на будущее, но сделать этого не могу)
Графика качественная, очень приятно смотрится. Герои живые и проработанные, ну и Элизабет делает игру на 30% лучше, чем она есть.
Советую приобрести, но только по скидке, большой суммы эта игра не стоит.
Excelente

I was bored looking around for good fps games to play and picked this up when there was a sale. Oh boy, i am impressed. Great story, locations and fun combat system. Never played any game like this before. If i could give it stars it would be 5/5 stars.

不论是steam或是metacritic上对这款游戏的吹捧让我在玩过之后感到困惑。剧情我理解得了，小姐姐身材衣着也很棒，游戏开始时进到恩波利亚城内即使在2020年看起来也称得上美不胜收。可箱体式的关卡用不断地坐电梯来推进剧情，支线任务如同鸡肋，敌人杂兵就几种（还没枪的类型多），无法手动即时保存的不适感，时不时卡死闪退的BUG，都一刀刀地削弱了我的游戏体验，加上枪支平衡度失调，多数技能升级都太贵只得放弃，最后一关飞艇战极其恶心这些小问题，让我觉得这只是一款过誉了的普通FPS剧情冒险游戏。[strike] 并且结局还让人不爽。 [/strike]
Really enjoyed playing this game since i read  a walkthru made it much more fun just wish it was more open.

This is the kind of game that may stick to you forever. I wish I could erase my memory just so I could feel the same way I felt when I played it 7 years ago. Great gameplay, great sceneries, great characters and on the top of all that, the storytelling is a masterpiece.

[h1]Shockingly Superb![/h1]
Man, hard to believe I first beat this 7 years ago when i was just a wee 13 year old. But what a game!

I'll refrain to talk about the plot at all here other than mentioning that the setup is you're in the shoes of US Vet Booker Dewitt in alternate history version of 1912 tasked to go and rescue a mysterious girl locked up in the floating city of Columbia since her childhood. Sounds pretty basic right? Well oh boyyy, you're in for one hell of an amazing, phenomenal ride, by the end you'll be left thinking about it for probable days. 

I do believe the game still holds up visually in 2020, lighting in some areas look genuinely modern and whilst the environment in certain places can look pretty dull - overall , the majority of sections in Columbia are pretty breathtaking in terms of its art direction and what they were going for. 

Gameplay wise, it's pretty good fun! You're able to zipline across areas, giving it a sense of variety and verticality. The gunplay feels decently heavy when you're shooting , however given the plethora of new weapons you come across I do wished it gave you more than simply carrying 2 at a time on you, as combined with the vigor powers you're able to exploit it would have made for some fantastic organic set pieces and action! Though i suppose they limited it for balance reasons. I also was hoping for more cool moments of zipline fighting than what there was  as it would have for more variety than the corridor to corridor shooting that it devolves into.

It's an easy recommendation to make! The Bioshock franchise is legendary at this point and I can see why.
